summary:
PayPal is a popular way to send and receive money online. It started in 1998 and became a big part of eBay's online auction business. People use PayPal to pay for things on websites and apps, replacing traditional paper methods like checks. 

In 2015, PayPal became its own company again and has since grown to be a major player in online payments, even joining the MACH Alliance in 2023. It's now one of the largest US corporations, making it easy for people to manage their money digitally.
title: PayPal
